document_title: Brugada syndrome: Causes, diagnosis and treatment
subsection_name: hoi-chung-brugada.json_6_Subjects at risk of Brugada syndrome
subsection_content: Brugada syndrome is more common in men than women. In fact, men are 8-10 times more likely to get this disease than women. All patients with a family history of sudden cardiac death or a direct relative with Brugada should be screened for the disease.
